Quest.QuestDescription: The Local magic merchant is in need of assistance

Task.TaskTitle: Talk to the local magic merchant
Task.TaskText: Go and talk to the local magic merchant he is normally located near the east walls of the castle

Conversation.Dialogue: {MAGIC_MERCHANT} Are you the one who has been helping people out around here?
{MAGIC_MERCHANT} Brilliant, would you like to help me?
{CHARACTER_NAME} I would, what would you like?
{MAGIC_MERCHANT} Wonderful, apparently a very rare magic gem has appeared on the far side of the forest near to the silver caves ...
{MAGIC_MERCHANT} ... as it is dangerous outside the castle walls could you go and check and retrieve it for me if it is there?
{MAGIC_MERCHANT} Great, see you back here soon then

Task.TaskText: The merchant reckons the gem is to the south of the forest beyond the caves. Go and retrieve it

Task.TaskTitle: Give the gem to the magice merchant

Conversation.Dialogue: {MAGIC_MERCHANT} Wonderful, you are a great help, I will let people know you helped me
